root.name: Combat Wings: The Great Battles of WWII
root.description: OverviewThis WWII air combat shooter contains 30 missions divided between four classic WWII campaigns: Britain, North Africa, the Pacific, and Russia. It features roughly 50 different WWII-era planes from Romania, France, Poland, Italy and more. The game supports both dual shock controller and PlayStation Move control schemes.Multiplayer ModesDeathmatchTeam DeathmatchRacingTeam RacingBomb-Target HuntingMission SurvivalFleet Escorting
